trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bedford
There were no other sightings in Bedford on or around February 16th 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsOn this particular morning there was a lot of aircraft traffic over my place of work which was unusal as you hardly ever see or hear an aircraft flying overhead. The sky was clear and the weather was fine at about 10 or 11 o'clock in the morning I decided to go outside my workshop to have a break, while I was outside I happened to look up into the sky, as I looked up I could see an airliner which was flying fairly low, the plane was silver with no visable markings. While I watched it flyover I happened to notice comming from the north west to south east a red oxide coloured disced shaped object which did a complete circled around the fusilege of the aircraft and then moved off at high speed to the south east. Approximately 5 seconds after this the same craft came back this time from the south west to the north east circling the aircraft again and heading off towards the north east. On that particular day because of the amount of air traffic passing over that morning there must have been something onboard that particular aircraft that it was interested in.
